option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
@echo off echo ======================================== echo Building Crime Tracking App echo ======================================== echo.
cd /d "%~dp0"
echo Step 1: Cleaning project... call gradlew.bat clean
echo. echo Step 2: Building project... call gradlew.bat build --stacktrace
echo. echo ======================================== echo Build Complete! echo ======================================== echo. echo If successful, you can now run the app. echo. pause
